name: e2fs-gui
description: Simple Electron GUI for browsing ext2/3/4 Linux disks on macOS using e2fsprogs

scripts.postversion: git push --follow-tags && sleep 3 && npm run postversion:watch
scripts.postversion:watch: gh run watch $(gh run list --workflow='Build & Release macOS' --limit 1 --json databaseId --jq '.[0].databaseId')
